advancedsignup.general.urlpath.title: URL Path
advancedsignup.general.urlpath.description:
Enter the URL path for the Advanced Sign Up form.

Do not use the URL path /register. This creates an error with your site.

advancedsignup.general.headerlinktext.title: Header Link
advancedsignup.general.headerlinktext.description:
Enter a label for the header link.

This field only applies if the standard customer registration form is inactive.

advancedsignup.general.loginformtext.title: Login Form New Account Message
advancedsignup.general.loginformtext.description:
Enter a message to display offering users to register for a new account.

The placeholder [[link]] is automatically replaced by the Login Form Link.

This field only applies if the standard customer registration form is inactive.
advancedsignup.general.loginformtext.default: To gain access as a wholesaler, you can [[link]].

advancedsignup.general.loginformlink.title: Login Form Link
advancedsignup.general.loginformlink.description: Enter a label for the login form link. This link is used in the Login Form New Account Message and leads to the URL path listed in the URL Path field.

advancedsignup.options.registeras.title: Register New Users As
advancedsignup.options.registeras.description:
Select how new users are registered in NetSuite from the following options:
  • Customer - Individual
  • Customer - Company and Contact
  • Lead - Individual
  • Lead - Company and Contact

advancedsignup.options.autoapprove.title: Auto-Approve Accounts That Meet Criteria
advancedsignup.options.autoapprove.description: Check this box to auto-approve accounts that meet specific criteria.

advancedsignup.options.autoapprovesaveds.title: Auto-Approve Saved Search
advancedsignup.options.autoapprovesaveds.description: Select the saved search that NetSuite uses to auto-approve accounts that meet specific criteria.

advancedsignup.options.role.title: Assign Role
advancedsignup.options.role.description: Select a NetSuite User Role to assign to new users.

advancedsignup.options.pricelevel.title: Price Level
advancedsignup.options.pricelevel.description: Select a price level to assign to new users.

advancedsignup.message.formheader.title: Form Header
advancedsignup.message.formheader.description: Enter a header to appear at the top of the sign up form.

advancedsignup.message.formtitle.title: Form Title
advancedsignup.message.formtitle.description: Enter a title for the sign up form.

advancedsignup.message.formsubtitle.title: Form Subtitle
advancedsignup.message.formsubtitle.description: Enter a subtitle for the sign up form.
advancedsignup.message.formsubtitle.default: Please complete the form to sign up for a wholesaler account.

advancedsignup.message.submitbuttonlabel.title: Submit Button Label
advancedsignup.message.submitbuttonlabel.description: Enter a label for the button that submits the sign up form.

advancedsignup.message.confirmationtitle.title: Confirmation Title
advancedsignup.message.confirmationtitle.description: Enter a title for the confirmation that appears after successfully submitting the sign up form.

advancedsignup.message.confirmationmessa.title: Confirmation Message
advancedsignup.message.confirmationmessa.description: Enter a message for the confirmation that appears after successfully submitting the sign up form.
advancedsignup.message.confirmationmessa.default: Once we approve your registration, you will receive an email containing a link to set your password. Please monitor your inbox for updates.

advancedsignup.message.requiredfieldwarn.title: Required Field Warning Message
advancedsignup.message.requiredfieldwarn.description:
Enter a message to display when a required field is left blank.

The placeholder [[field]] is automatically replaced by the field name.

advancedsignup.message.submiterror.title: Submission Error Message
advancedsignup.message.submiterror.description: Enter a message to display if the sign up form experiences a failure with submission.
advancedsignup.message.submiterror.default: There was a problem saving your information.

advancedsignup.message.filetoolarge.title: File Upload Too Large Error Message
advancedsignup.message.filetoolarge.description: Enter a message to display when a user selects a file that is too large. For fields where the Field Type is File Upload Upload, a user can upload a file with a maximum size of 10 megabytes (MB).
advancedsignup.message.filetoolarge.default: The selected file is too large. The maximum file size is 10 megabytes (MB).

advancedsignup.email.templateId.title: Email Template
advancedsignup.email.templateId.description: Select the email template used for the Advanced Sign Up email alerting users that their registration is pending approval.

advancedsignup.email.authorEmployeeId.title: Email Employee Sender
advancedsignup.email.authorEmployeeId.description: Select from which employee the Advanced Sign Up email originates.

advancedsignup.form.country.title: Form Countries
advancedsignup.form.country.description: Select each country to appear for the Countries field of the sign up form.

advancedsignup.form.marketingsubscriptio.title: Offer Marketing Email Subscription
advancedsignup.form.marketingsubscriptio.description:
Check this box to offer a marketing email subscription on the sign up form.

For users who choose to subscribe, the Global Subscription Status field is set to Soft Opt-In and subscription fields are checked on the Customer or Lead record.

advancedsignup.form.marketingsubscriptio.title: Marketing Email Subscription Label
advancedsignup.form.marketingsubscriptio.description: Enter a label for the marketing email subscription option on the sign up form.
advancedsignup.form.marketingsubscriptio.default: Sign me up for exclusive offers, promotions, and news
